name: Salary Classification
query:
SELECT
    emp_name AS "ID:Link/Employee Details:120",
    salary AS "Salary:Currency:100",
    CASE
        WHEN salary >= 100000 THEN 'High'
        WHEN salary >= 50000 THEN 'Medium'
        ELSE 'Low'
    END AS "Salary Band:Data:80"
FROM
    `tabEmployee Details`
ORDER BY salary DESC
